Maryam’s Art

Maryam’s Art is a website I built for my sister, a professional artist. I designed and built it from scratch using vanilla HTML, CSS, and Javascript.

Live

View Site

TYPE

Side Project

STACK

HTML

CSS

Javascript

Web Stack and Explanation

HTML, CSS, and Javascript are the fundamentals of web development. Building the website with these core technologies gave me more flexibility and customizability.

Problems and Thought Process

Developing this website was a compelling learning journey. I found most parts easy to implement. The area that was a little bit challenging was implementing the gallery slider and making it responsive on mobile.

I had the choice of building the slider using a library. However, implementing it with pure Javascript helped me to practice my programming skills and cut out the need for needless code shipping with the final website.

Lessons Learned

Maryam’s Art is the first website I built from scratch. I learned how to organize my HTML code and implement important CSS concepts such as Flexbox, Gridbox, and media queries for responsiveness.
